title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 934/87 of 31 March 1987 fixing for the 1987 marketing year the reference prices for table grapes
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 934/87
of 31 March 1987
fixing for the 1987 marketing year the reference prices for table grapes
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1987 marketing year, the reference prices for table grapes, falling within subheading 08.04 A I of the Common Customs Tariff, expressed in ECU per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
21 July to 31 August: 50,91
September and October: 48,24
November (1 to 20): 44,02

This Regulation shall enter into force on 21 July 1987.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 March 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
